content.description: Marcia avoids crowds because she is afraid that she will not be able to escape. She avoids going to movie theaters, riding in elevators, and using public transportation. Sometimes her fear is so overwhelming Marcia doesnâ€™t leave her house.
content.question: Marcia is experiencing which of the following?
